pkgmetadata.longdescription:
TLP brings you the benefits of advanced power management for Linux without the need to understand every technical detail. TLP comes with a default configuration already optimized for battery life, so you may just install and forget it. Nevertheless TLP is highly customizable to fulfil your specific requirements.
TLP runs on every laptop brand. Setting the battery charge thresholds is available for IBM/Lenovo ThinkPads only.

use.flag:
Rely on sys-power/pm-utils for handling system suspend/hibernate/resume. Deprecated and not supported upstream anymore.
It is recommended to keep this flag disabled and use either sys-apps/systemd or sys-auth/elogind.
Radio device wizard: switch radios upon network connect/disconnect and dock/undock
Use the bundled tpacpi-bat script instead of app-laptop/tpacpi-bat.
